title: Macbeth by William Shakespeare: an introduction
creator_credit: Raoul Sobel, Insight Productions (US), BHE Education and Film Associates
brief_description: An abbreviated version of Macbeth is performed by a talented English company. Brief narrative bridges are used to connect the scenes, forming a comprehensible and dramatic introduction to the play. The adaption preserves the sense of madness and tragedy of the full length drama.
